episodes.title: Law Enforcement Guide to Satanic Cults | VHS, 1994
episodes.description:
Produced during a period of widespread moral panic and sensationalism, this training video was intended to equip law enforcement officers with knowledge about identifying and investigating alleged "satanic cults" and "ritual abuse."

What to expect in this video:
- A look at the historical context of the 1980s and 90s Satanic Panic.
- The dated and often controversial information presented to police regarding symbols, rituals, and alleged criminal activity.
- Archival footage and dramatic reenactments typical of VHS-era training materials.
- A fascinating, sometimes unsettling, look at how fear and misinformation shaped public and institutional responses to alternative subcultures.

Presented for archival and educational purposes. All rights remain with their respective copyright holders.
